product_name: CamelBak L.U.X.E. NV Hydration Pack - 100 fl. oz. - Women's
long_description: The women's CamelBak L.U.X.E. NV hydration pack boasts a fully ventilated back panel for excellent comfort, plus generous capacity and a 100 fl. oz. reservoir for all-day mountain biking sessions. Lightweight NV(TM) back panel features articulating pods that hold the load away from your back for dependable ventilation. Women-specific design includes soft contact points, a narrow, curved shoulder harness and a slider sternum strap. 100 fl. oz. Antidote(TM) reservoir sits in its own rear-entry compartment and is equipped with the Quick Link(TM) connection system for easy removal of the drinking tube. Quick Link system also lets you effortlessly add accessories such as a Fresh(TM) filter, insulated tube, tube director or flow meter (accessories sold separately). Big Bite(TM) valve is ergonomically positioned for easy drinking; valve securely shuts off water flow with an easy, quick turn. Main compartment, hipbelt pockets, front zippered pocket with internal organization and lined media pocket store and organize gear; expandable scoop pocket holds extra gear. Helmet attachment points make it easy to secure your helmet during transport. Side compression straps let you cinch down loads for jostle-free carrying. Removable rain cover helps keep your gear dry in wet weather. The CamelBak L.U.X.E. NV hydration pack has reflective details that increase your visibility in low light.
short_description: The women's CamelBak L.U.X.E. NV hydration pack boasts a fully ventilated back panel for excellent comfort, plus generous capacity and a 100 fl. oz. reservoir for all-day mountain biking sessions.
